text: The dashboard loads too slowly when we have large datasets. It takes over 30 seconds to load our quarterly reports.
Love the new search feature! It finds exactly what I need in seconds. This saves me hours every week.
Mobile app crashes when uploading files larger than 10MB. This is blocking our field team from submitting reports.
Need Excel export functionality for our reports. Currently we can only get CSV which doesn't preserve formatting.
Please add dark mode theme. Working late hours is hard on the eyes with the bright interface.
API documentation is confusing and lacks examples. Spent 3 hours trying to figure out authentication.
Fantastic customer support! The team responded within 2 hours and solved our integration issue perfectly.
Bulk actions would save us so much time. Currently we have to update records one by one which is tedious.
The new onboarding flow is much clearer. New team members can get started in minutes instead of hours.
Need better filtering options in the analytics section. Can't slice data by custom date ranges.
Love the real-time collaboration features! Multiple team members can work on the same project seamlessly.
Security audit found some issues with data encryption. Need to address this for compliance requirements.
The pricing is fair for what we get. Much better value than competitors with similar features.
Integration with Salesforce would be huge for us. Currently we're doing manual data sync which is error-prone.
The mobile app UI is intuitive but could use better offline capabilities for field work.
